meanings.definition: Robert Guiscard (c. 1015 – 1085), a Norman adventurer who conquered southern Italy and Sicily.
meanings.english_definition: Robert Guiscard (c. 1015 – 1085), a Norman adventurer who conquered southern Italy and Sicily.

etymology.value: From a Germanic personal name composed of the elements *gisil* (“pledge, hostage”) + *hard* (“hard, strong”).
